SELECT UF.fileSeq, UF.userName, UF.thumbnailCheck, UF.fileType, UF.fileSize, UF.fileName, UF.filePath, UF.originalName, UF.includeDir, UF.createTime FROM metadata UF WHERE UF.userName = #{userName} and UF.fileSeq = #{fileSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO metadata ( userName, fileType, fileSize, fileName, thumbnailCheck, filePath, originalName, includeDir, createTime ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{fileType}, #{size}, #{fileName}, #{thumbnailCheck}, #{filePath}, #{originalName}, #{includeDir}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE metadata SET fileName = #{fileName} WHERE userName = #{userName} and fileSeq = #{fileSeq}
